Relational modules

The provided implementations for relational entities. They implement the abstract classes of the main interface.

OData

Implements the Resource and ResourceIterator for OData based on pyodata.

ODataResource

class rel2graph.relational_modules.odata.ODataResource[source]

Bases: Resource

Implementation of the oData Resource. Enables access to an odata entity

property type

Returns the type of the resource. Is used to select correct factory

property odata_entity

Returns the oData Entity behind the resource

clear_supplies() → None

Clears the supplies

property supplies: Dict

Returns access to supplies from past factories.

ODataListItereator

class rel2graph.relational_modules.odata.ODataListIterator[source]

Bases: ResourceIterator

Implements a Iterator that works based on a list of oData Entities.

next() → Resource[source]

Gets the next resource. Returns None if the range is traversed

reset_to_first() → None[source]

Resets the iterator to point to the first element

Pandas

Implements the Resource and ResourceIterator for pandas.

PandasSeriesResource

class rel2graph.relational_modules.pandas.PandasSeriesResource[source]

Bases: Resource

Implementation of the pandas Resource. Enables access to an pandas series

property type

Returns the type of the resource. Is used to select correct factory

property series

Gets the wrapped pandas series

clear_supplies() → None

Clears the supplies

property supplies: Dict

Returns access to supplies from past factories.

PandasDataframeIterator

class rel2graph.relational_modules.pandas.PandasDataframeIterator[source]

Bases: ResourceIterator

Implements a Iterator that works based on a list of oData Entities.

next() → PandasSeriesResource[source]

Gets the next resource. Returns None if the range is traversed

reset_to_first() → None[source]

Resets the iterator to point to the first element
